title: [SOLVED]820-00426 Looking for BV and Schematics
message: Is this the same BV and schem as the 820-00138?

title: [SOLVED]820-00426 Looking for BV and Schematics
message: They are just some termination/pullup resistors on the eDP lines. They will be the same for older model boards, you will just need to trace out how they are connected.

title: [SOLVED]820-00426 Looking for BV and Schematics
message: Don't have BV for 00138. Would you mind sharing?
